“””

Past Ham Gratin

Prep Time

15min

Cooking Time

30min

Serves

4+

Family Rating

5 stars

Source

not sure

Ingredients

  • 350 g Pasta (Penne, Fusilli, …)

  • 300 g cooked ham cut into cubes

  • 600-700 ml broth

  • 200 ml cream

  • 1 Tbsp Cornstarch

  • 1 Tbsp Tomato concentrated

  • 1 Tsp Paprika

  • Salt, Pepper and nutmeg

  • 1 Bay leaf

  • 150 g Gratin cheese (Peccorino has been recommended)

Preaparation

  1. Pre-heat oven to 180-200°C

  2. Place the dry pasta in a Pyrex dish

  3. Spread the cubed ham over the pasta

  4. Mix the liquids and the spices

  5. Mix the corn starch and add everything on top of the pasta, which will have to be covered (or it won’t cook)

  6. Cover everything with the gratin cheese and place in oven for 30min
